About Me

Let me tell you a little about myself and what i do ...

Your Project is in Safe Hands

Hello, my names Ahmed and I'm an LA based Software Engineer with an interest in web-design and AI. I first began to code when my MSA club from University needed a wesbite that would attract more members and look sleek, however, we were all broke and none of us knew how to code so i took the challenge upon myself along with a friend to make our own site from scratch. I immediately fell in love with the process and the idea that I could create nearly anything I want from seemingly nothing and it would reach people in different countries. Since then I've been freelacing and slowly improving my skills.
